Description.Text: This hotel is located 5 minutes from the bus station and 10 minutes from the centre of Ouarzazate, with its restaurants, bars, nightspots and shops. It is 5 km to the Oscar Studios, 15 km to Oasis de Fint, 32 km to Ait Benhaddou, 42 km to the Palmeraie of Skoura and 127 km to the Dadas gorges. The hotel lies just 10 minutes from Ouarzazate Airport.

This charming, family-friendly city hotel is new and built in the style of a riad. This very attractive property has a beautiful location and comprises a total of 12 rooms including 4 junior suites. It offers excellent service at the reception, as well as rooms and meals that are sophisticated and refined. Facilities on offer to guests include a lobby area with a 24-hour reception and check-out service, a hotel safe, a cloakroom and a TV lounge. There is a restaurant and guests will appreciate the wireless Internet access and laundry service (for an additional fee). Parking is available for those arriving by car.
